long_description: Replace your handcarved twig with the Camp Chef Extendable roasting stick and see the difference. Extendable design makes it great for car camping and backpacking. Extendable design collapses to 19.75 in. long for easy transportation; fully extended stick measures 30.25 in. long, letting you stand well away from the fire while roasting. Reversed stainless-steel wire holder securely holds onto hot dogs and marshmallows; roast 2 hot dogs at a time, or multiple marshmallows. Wooden grip provides a comfortable hold and keeps your hands away from the flames.
short_description: Replace your handcarved twig with the Camp Chef Extendable roasting stick and see the difference. Extendable design makes it great for car camping and backpacking.
